FuncDef: This command configures the IP protocol to use to use as match criteria.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the value configured and the value in the flow must be equal.
Specifies that the value configured differs from the value in the flow.

Specifies the decimal value representing the IP protocol to be used as an IP filter match criterion. Well known protocol numbers include ICMP (1), TCP (6), UDP (17). Values-1 to 255 (Decimal, Hexadecimal, or Binary representation)..
